0.name: fool
0.description: “A fool takes no pleasure in understanding, but only in expressing his opinion.” -Proverbs 18:2

1.name: magician
1.description: “The way of a fool is right in his own eyes, but a wise man listens to advice.” - Proverbs 12:15

2.name: priestess
2.description: “For nothing is hidden that will not be made manifest, nor is anything secret that will not be known and come to light.” - Luke 8:17
reverse: A time to focus on the tangible

3.name: empress
3.description: “She looks well to the ways of her household and does not eat the bread of idleness.” - Proverbs 31:27
